title: babies font
content:
hi guys, I wonder if this is a font or a custom draw letters. Would you suggest me some similar fonts?

thanks in advnace

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151248im_/http:/typophile.com/files/baby-2.jpg)
author: mariano

comments.content: I can't see your sample. Try reformatting your image.

Í just can´t upload my image. it says : "File copy failed: no directory configured, or it could not be accessed"

what does that means?
The two "B"s are different, so I guess it's custom drawn.
I'm pretty sure the B's are identical, but as far as knowing the font; sorry.

\>I’m pretty sure the B’s are identical,

No, one is pink and one is green ;-)

Lotta comedians around ;)

If you can use something close, one that comes to mind is [ITC Jellybaby](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151248/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-jellybaby/).The lower csae 'i' is the same height as the uppercase letters, so that works too. I'm still looking for a better match.

- Mike Yanega

[Galapagos Robusto](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151248/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/galapagos/robusto/) could also be used this way, though the stems are not quite as curved. Still looking...

- Mike Yanega

['Popcorn'](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419151248/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script05Pg29.html) (6th one down the page) from Signfonts is stylistically the closest I have found so far.

- Mike Yanega

\> No, one is pink and one is green ;-)

LOL

thanks to all for your suggestions! I apreciated them

;)
thank you very much...-ขอบคุณค่ะ
